name: ILIFERoboter
0:
”Alexa, ask sweeping robot to start cleaning”
”Alexa, ask sweeping robot to stop cleaning”
”Alexa, ask sweeping robot to start charging”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sweeping robot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using Amazon Alexa, the ILIFE Roboter skill allows you to interact, monitor and control your Robot Vacuum Cleaner by using voice commands.
To get started, you will need to link your ILIFE Roboter skill with your app account.
Once linked, you can use voice commands to control your Robot Vacuum Cleaner.

 For instance, you can try the below voice commands:
Alexa, ask sweeping robot to start cleaning.　 
Alexa, ask sweeping robot to stop cleaning.　
Alexa, ask sweeping robot to start charging.
